text.High_Empathy: Hello! I am so warm and happy to meet you. I'm here to be your personal skincare companion.
text.High_Expertise: Welcome to Glow & Co. I am the AI Dermatological Assistant.

text.High_Empathy: I want to get to know you deeply so I can take the best care of your skin.
text.High_Expertise: I will now conduct a comprehensive 50-point skin analysis protocol.

text.High_Empathy: To start, may I ask your age? This helps me understand your skin's stage of life.
text.High_Expertise: Input your biological age for collagen density estimation.

text.High_Empathy: And what should I call you? I'd love to know your name.
text.High_Expertise: State your preferred identifier.

text.High_Empathy: --- Let's talk about YOU ---
text.High_Expertise: --- DATA: DEMOGRAPHICS ---

text.High_Empathy: How would you describe your skin usually? Is it dry, oily, or maybe a mix?
text.High_Expertise: Select primary skin classification: Dry, Oily, Combination, or Normal.

text.High_Empathy: Does your skin ever get red or itchy? I want to be extra gentle if it does.
text.High_Expertise: Report any history of cutaneous reactivity or erythema.

text.High_Empathy: What is the one thing bothering you most about your skin right now?
text.High_Expertise: Identify primary dermatological concern.

text.High_Empathy: Is there anything else? Even small things matter to me.
text.High_Expertise: List secondary concerns if applicable.

text.High_Empathy: Do you drink enough water during the day? Hydration is self-care!
text.High_Expertise: Quantify daily H2O intake in liters.

text.High_Empathy: How have you been sleeping lately? Beauty sleep is real!
text.High_Expertise: Average hours of sleep per circadian cycle.

text.High_Empathy: Have you been feeling stressed? Stress can really show up on our skin.
text.High_Expertise: Rate current cortisol/stress levels on a scale of 1-10.

text.High_Empathy: Do you eat a lot of veggies and fruits? They make your skin glow!
text.High_Expertise: Assess dietary antioxidant consumption frequency.

text.High_Empathy: Do you spend a lot of time out in the sun?
text.High_Expertise: Estimate weekly UV exposure hours.

text.High_Empathy: And do you remember to wear sunscreen? It's the best protection.
text.High_Expertise: Confirm SPF application frequency: Daily, Occasional, or Never.

text.High_Empathy: Do you wear makeup often? I love a good look, but we need to cleanse it off!
text.High_Expertise: Frequency of cosmetic application.

text.High_Empathy: When you wash your face, do you like foam or something creamy?
text.High_Expertise: Preferred surfactant vehicle: Foaming vs. Emollient.

text.High_Empathy: Do you use scrubs or peels? Sometimes they can be harsh.
text.High_Expertise: Frequency of physical or chemical exfoliation.

text.High_Empathy: Do you use a toner? It can be refreshing.
text.High_Expertise: Current usage of pH-balancing astringents.

text.High_Empathy: Have you tried serums before? They are like magic potions for skin.
text.High_Expertise: Current usage of concentrated active serums.

text.High_Empathy: Do you use anything for the delicate eye area?
text.High_Expertise: Application of orbital skincare products.

text.High_Empathy: Do you use a moisturizer every day?
text.High_Expertise: Consistency of lipid barrier reinforcement (moisturizer).

text.High_Empathy: Do you hate it when creams feel sticky? Or do you like that rich feeling?
text.High_Expertise: Texture preference: fast-absorbing vs. occlusive film.

text.High_Empathy: Do you like your products to smell like flowers or nothing at all?
text.High_Expertise: Tolerance for synthetic or natural fragrance components.

text.High_Empathy: Do you prefer pumps or jars? We want it to be easy for you.
text.High_Expertise: Preferred dispensing mechanism.

text.High_Empathy: How much are you comfortable spending on a treat for yourself?
text.High_Expertise: Define budgetary constraints for regimen construction.

text.High_Empathy: How much time do you have in the mornings? I know you're busy.
text.High_Expertise: Maximum duration available for AM protocol.

text.High_Empathy: Is the air where you live dry or humid right now?
text.High_Expertise: Current environmental humidity levels.

text.High_Empathy: Thank you for sharing all that. I feel like I know your skin so well now.
text.High_Expertise: Data collection complete. Processing optimal formulation match.

text.High_Empathy: I strictly recommend starting with a gentle cleanser. This one is like a cloud!
text.High_Expertise: Step 1: Hydro-Lipid Cleansing Gel. Essential for microbiome preservation.

text.High_Empathy: Doesn't it look soothing? What do you think?
text.High_Expertise: Confirm acceptance of Step 1.

text.High_Empathy: Next, this serum is my favorite. It's golden and precious, just like you.
text.High_Expertise: Step 2: 5% Niacinamide Serum. Clinical data shows 40% reduction in redness.

text.High_Empathy: Can you imagine using this every night?
text.High_Expertise: Confirm acceptance of Step 2.

text.High_Empathy: Finally, this cream will wrap your skin in a hug.
text.High_Expertise: Step 3: Ceramide Barrier Repair Cream. Occlusive agent.

text.High_Empathy: It looks so rich, doesn't it?
text.High_Expertise: Confirm acceptance of Step 3.

text.High_Empathy: Do you think you could do this 3-step routine?
text.High_Expertise: Evaluate compliance probability for 3-step protocol.

text.High_Empathy: What are you hoping to see in your skin in a month?
text.High_Expertise: Define 30-day efficacy success metrics.

text.High_Empathy: You are going to do great. I believe in you!
text.High_Expertise: Regimen generation complete.

text.High_Empathy: I'm always here if you need a friend or skincare advice.
text.High_Expertise: System entering standby mode.
